title: Video: Tour Kate Courtney’s “Fitness Fortress” backyard training center
content:
Wonder how World Champion Kate Courtney stays in shape at home? Check out her “Fitness Fortress” in this video, complete with weights, balance training, and the requisite ice bath, sauna, and hot tub… We’re a bit jealous of the space and equipment, but we’re not world champs, so the CST Fusion will have to do […]

The post Video: Tour Kate Courtney’s “Fitness Fortress” backyard training center appeared first on Bikerumor.
author: Tyler Benedict
